19001497.ja:

手に入れた！<me 60>
19001497.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>获得了
妮泊珑的戒指（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001497.zh-Hant:

獲得了

17297.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Giants! Can you hear my voice?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17297.ja: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「巨人族よ！　ボクの声が　聞こえるか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17297.ko: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 거인족! 내 목소리가 들려?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17297.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>巨人啊！能听到我的声音吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17297.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>巨人族啊！能聽到我的聲音嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17298.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Ooh! You do hear me! It seems the magic was successful!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17298.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「おお！　聞こえているか！
　どうやら術は　成功したようだな！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17298.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 오오! 들리는구나!
　아무래도 술법은 성공한 모양이야!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17298.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>哦哦！听到了嘛！
看来法术成功了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17298.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>喔喔！聽到了嗎！
看來法術成功了！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17299.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I apologize if I surprised you. Just then, that was
magic to ensure that you of the Giants' Tribe and I
could communicate.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17299.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「おどろかせて　すまない。
　今のは　ボクと　巨人族であるキミが
　言葉を交わせるようにするための術だったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17299.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 놀라게 해서 미안하군.
　방금 그건 나와 거인족인 네가
　대화할 수 있게 만드는 술법이었어.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17299.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>吓到你不好意思啦。
这个法术能让我和巨人族的你
用语言沟通呢。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17299.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>嚇到你不好意思。
剛才的是能讓我和巨人族的你
用語言溝通的法術。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17300.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>My name is Sigurd! I am a Valhalla warrior, who
fights to protect the balance of the world!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17300.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「ボクの名は　シグルド！
　世界の均衡を守るべく戦う　ヴァルハラの戦士！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17300.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 내 이름은 시구르드!
　세계의 균형을 지키고자 싸우는 발할라의 전사!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17300.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我叫希格尔德！
我是瓦尔哈拉的战士，为守护世界的均衡而战！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17300.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我叫希格爾德！
我是瓦爾哈拉的戰士，為守護世界的均衡而戰！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17301.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Thy name... I see, <cs_pchero>, is it!
I imagined just such a fierce, yet beautiful name.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17301.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「キミの名は……　そうか　<cs_pchero>か！
　ボクの想像どおり　猛々しく　美しい名前だ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17301.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 네 이름은…… 아, {cs_pchero}|hpp(이로,로)군!
　상상한 대로 늠름하고 아름다운 이름이야.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17301.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>你叫……哦，<cs_pchero>吗！
和我想象中一样，真是个威风又美丽的名字。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17301.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>你叫……喔，是<cs_pchero>嗎！
和我想像中一樣，真是個威風又美麗的名字。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000400.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「け……ケキちゃん……？？？
　しゃべった……！！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000400.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 케…… 케키……???
　말을 했어……!?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000400.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>华……华季……？？？
说话了！！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000400.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>小……小蛋糕……？？？
說話了……！！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17302.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Daring Giant, <cs_pchero>! Thou art aware
of it, dost thou not? Our world's balance is beginning
to shift.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17302.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「勇猛な巨人族　<cs_pchero>よ！
　キミは　気づいているか？
　我らの世界の均衡が　崩れ始めていることに。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17302.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 용맹한 거인족, <cs_pchero>!
　넌 느껴지나? 우리 세계의 균형이
　무너지기 시작한 것 말이야.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17302.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>勇猛的巨人<cs_pchero>啊！
你发现了吗？
我们这个世界的均衡，正在被打破。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17302.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>勇猛的巨人族<cs_pchero>啊！
你發現了嗎？
我們這個世界的均衡正在瓦解。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000401.en:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>This Cakey... Doll... From the Nabunabu doll set...??
It looks a little familiar...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000401.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「この　ケキちゃん……人形……。
　ナブナブ人形セットの……？？
　なんか　見覚え　ある……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000401.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 이 케키…… 인형…….
　나블나블 인형 세트의……??
　왠지 낯이 익은데…….<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000401.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>这个华季……玩偶……
纳布纳布玩偶套装……？？
我好像在哪里见到过……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000401.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>這個小蛋糕……娃娃……
納布納布娃娃套組……？？
我好像在哪裡看過……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17303.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I hath been on a long journey to prevent it, but
along the way I was captured by that giant bird and
taken prisoner in this nest.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17303.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「ボクは　それを食い止めるために　長い旅を
　していたが　その途中で　先ほどの巨鳥に捕まり
　この巣に　囚われてしまったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17303.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 난 그걸 막기 위해서 긴 여행을
　하던 중에 아까 그 거대한 새에게 붙잡혀서
　이 둥지에 갇혀 있었다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17303.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我就是为了阻止这个而踏上旅程的。
可惜一个不小心被刚才那只巨鸟抓住，
关在这个巢里了。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17303.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我就是為了阻止這個而踏上旅程的。
可惜一個不小心被剛才那隻巨鳥抓住，
關在這個巢裡了。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17305.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Truly, an unexpected experience, but if this was in
order to meet thee, <cs_pchero>, it must
have been fate.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17305.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「まったく　とんだ目にあったが
　これも　<cs_pchero>に　出会うための
　運命だったのかもしれない。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17305.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 정말 끔찍한 꼴을 당했지만
　이게 다 {cs_pchero}|hpp(을,를) 만나기 위한
　운명이었을지도 몰라.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17305.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>真是倒霉啊。
不过这也可能是为了与<cs_pchero>相遇
而命中注定的呢。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17305.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>真是倒楣啊。
不過這也可能是為了與<cs_pchero>相遇
而命中註定的呢。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17306.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>I have something I need to discuss with you.
I apologize, but willst thou ferry me to the Hall of
Valhalla where my companions await me?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17306.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「キミに　相談したいことがあるんだ。
　すまないが　仲間の待つ　ヴァルハラの館へ
　ボクを　連れていってくれないだろうか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17306.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 너에게 의논하고 싶은 일이 있다.
　미안하지만 동료가 기다리는 발할라의 전당으로
　날 데려다줄 수 없을까?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17306.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我有事想和你商量。
能不能带我去瓦尔哈拉之馆，
去和等我的同伴们汇合呢？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17306.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我有事想和你商量。
不好意思，能請你帶我去瓦爾哈拉公館，
去和等我的夥伴們會合呢？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17307.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>...What's that thou sayest? That thou came at the
behest of one to recover a ring stolen by the giant
bird.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17307.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「……なんだって？
　キミは　人に頼まれて　巨鳥に奪われた指輪を
　取り返しにきていたのか。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17307.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: ……뭐?
　넌 사람의 부탁으로 거대한 새에게 빼앗긴
　반지를 되찾으러 온 거였다고?<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17307.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……什么？
你是受人之托，
来这里取回被巨鸟夺走的戒指的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17307.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……什麼？
你是受人之託，
來這裡取回被巨鳥奪走的指環嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17308.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Then that mission ought to take priority. First,
we must deliver the ring to its rightful owner!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17308.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「それなら　優先すべきは　その使命だな。
　まずは　その指輪を　持ち主に届けよう！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17308.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 그 사명이 먼저지.
　우선 그 반지를 주인에게 가져다주자!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17308.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>这可是件应该优先完成的使命啊。
那就先把这戒指还给失主吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17308.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>這可是件應該優先完成的使命啊。
那就先把這指環還給失主吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17309.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Daring Giant, <cs_pchero>! At my pace, traveling
there would take time. I shall enter thy bag.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17309.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「勇猛な巨人族　<cs_pchero>よ！
　ボクの足では　移動するのに　時間がかかる。
　キミの　かばんに　入らせてもらうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17309.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 용맹한 거인족 {cs_pchero}|hpp(이여,여)!
　내 다리로는 이동에 시간이 걸려.
　그러니까 네 가방에 좀 들어가야겠다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17309.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>勇猛的巨人<cs_pchero>啊！
我走得慢，
把我放进你的背包里吧。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17309.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>勇猛的巨人族<cs_pchero>啊！
靠我的雙腳移動太花時間了，
我就進你的包包囉。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001498.ja:
<cs_pchero>は
戦士シグルド（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
19001498.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>获得了
战士希格尔德（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001498.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>獲得了
戰士希格爾德（重要物品）！<me 60>

17311.en: From inside the bag, Sigurd's voice can be heard.
17311.ja: かばんの中から　シグルドの声が聞こえる。
17311.zh-Hans: 包里传来希格尔德的声音。
17311.zh-Hant: 從包包裡傳來了希格爾德的聲音。

17312.en: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>It appears that thou hast completed thy mission!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17312.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「どうやら　これで
　キミの使命は　済んだようだな！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17312.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 보아하니
　네 사명을 마친 모양이로군!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17312.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>这下子
你的使命就完成了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17312.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>看來這下子
你的使命就完成了吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17313.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Then I apologize, but my companions await, onward,
to the Hall of Valhalla!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17313.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「それでは　すまないが　ボクの仲間が待つ
　ヴァルハラの館へ　向かってくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17313.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 그럼 미안하지만 내 동료가 기다리는
　발할라의 전당으로 가자꾸나!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17313.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>请带我去瓦尔哈拉之馆
和伙伴们汇合吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17313.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>那麼不好意思，請帶我去瓦爾哈拉公館
和夥伴們會合吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17314.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Verily, fortunate for us, the Hall of Valhalla is in this
town of the tribe of Giants!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17314.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「じつは　幸運なことに　ヴァルハラの館は
　この　巨人族の町にあるんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17314.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 사실 행운인 게, 발할라의 전당은
　이 거인족 마을에 있지!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17314.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>说来也巧，
瓦尔哈拉之馆就在这个巨人族的镇子里。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17314.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>說來也巧，
瓦爾哈拉公館就在這個巨人族的市鎮裡！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17315.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>If thou ascend those stairs, there art an extra-
ordinarily large home of the Giants. Enter there and
aim toward the right-hand room with the pink door!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17315.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「あの階段を上がれば　巨人族の住まう
　特別　大きな家がある。そこに入って
　右手にある　桃色の扉の部屋を目指してくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17315.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 저 계단을 올라가면 거인족이 사는
　유난히 큰 집이 있다. 거기로 들어가서
　오른쪽에 있는 분홍색 문의 방으로 가자!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17315.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>从这楼梯上去，
有个巨人居住的特别大的房子。
进去之后找右边那个有着粉色大门的房间吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17315.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>從這樓梯上去，
有個巨人族居住的特別大的房子。
進去後就前往右手邊有著粉色大門的房間吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000402.en: <start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>My... Mine... My... Room?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000402.ja:

17316.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>All! For my sluggishness, I apologize! It is I! Now, I

<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>各位，很抱歉迟到了！

17317.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>Ooh, Master Sigurd!! Welcome... Safely, thou hast

<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「おおっ　シグルド様！！

<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 오옷, 시구르드 님!!

<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>Uninjured, it seems, above all else. We all hath been

17318.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>「おケガが　ねえようで　なによりです。

17318.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>: 다치신 곳은 없으신 것 같아 다행입니다.
　저희 모두는 시구르드 님의 귀환을
　목이 빠지게 기다렸습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17318.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>您没受什么伤真是太好了。
我们一直在

17320.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>Even under the gaze of that one, our bodies move!

17320.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 저 사람이 쳐다보는데도

<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>即使被他看到，我们的身体也一样能动！

<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>即使被他看到，我們的身體也一樣能動！

17321.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>Master Sigurd! At last, a warrior of the Giants, one
worthy of the Hall of Valhalla; thou hast made thy
companion!<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17321.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「シグルド様！　ついに巨人族の戦士に
　ふさわしき者を　このヴァルハラの館へと
　お連れになったのですな！<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17321.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 시구르드 님! 드디어 거인족 전사로
　적합한 자를 이 발할라의 전당으로
　데려오셨군요!<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17321.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>希格尔德大人！
您总算把从巨人族战士中选出的合适的人

17321.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>希格爾德大人！
您總算把巨人族戰士中合適的人選
帶到這瓦爾哈拉公館來了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17322.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>. We, warriors of Valhalla, when subject
to the gaze of the Giants unexposed to that aforesaid
magic, are unable to stir our bodies.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17322.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「<pc>。我々　ヴァルハラの戦士は
　先ほどの術の　かかっていない　巨人族の
　視線をあびると　身体が動かなくなるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17322.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: <pc>. 우리 발할라의 전사는
　아까 그 술법이 걸리지 않은 거인족의
　시선을 받으면 몸이 움직이지 않아.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17322.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>。
我等瓦尔哈拉的战士如果不使用刚才那法术，
被巨人族看到后，身体会无法动弹。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17322.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001><pc>。
我等瓦爾哈拉的戰士如果不使用剛才那法術，
只要被巨人族看到，身體就會無法動彈。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17323.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>This is a constraint levied against we who run counter
to the laws of this realm. The warriors of Valhalla
art all who originally lost their lives in battle.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17323.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「これは　我々が　世の理に背いたゆえの制約。
　ヴァルハラの戦士は　もとは皆
　戦いのうちに　命を落とした戦士なのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17323.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 우리가 세상의 이치를 등져서 생긴 제약이지.
　발할라의 전사는 원래 모두
　전투 중에 목숨을 잃은 전사들이다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17323.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>此乃我等违背世间之理所背负的制约。
所有瓦尔哈拉的战士，
都是已在战争中失去生命的战士。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17323.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>此乃我等違背世間攝理所背負的制約。
所有瓦爾哈拉的戰士，
都是已在戰爭中失去生命的戰士。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17325.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Come! To thou I will tell wherefore to the Hall of
Valhalla I beckoned thee.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17325.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「さあ！　キミを　このヴァルハラの館へ
　招いた理由を話そう。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17325.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 자! 너를 이 발할라의 전당으로
　초대한 이유를 얘기해 볼까.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17325.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>好了！现在就告诉你，
为何要你来这瓦尔哈拉之馆。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17325.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>好了！現在就告訴你，
為何要你來這瓦爾哈拉公館。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17326.en:
<center>Ye Giants may not knowest. That thy world is ruled by
a grand being called the Odin the Mediator.
17326.ja:
<center>キミたち　巨人族は　知らないだろう。
世界は　調停者オーディンと呼ばれる
大いなる存在に　支配されていることを。
17326.ko:
<center>너희 거인족은 모를 거다.
세계는 조정자 오딘이라는
위대한 존재에게 지배당하고 있다는 사실을.
17326.zh-Hans:
<center>你们巨人族大概不知道吧。
这个世界是由被称为
调停者奥丁的伟大至尊支配着的。
17326.zh-Hant:
<center>你們巨人族大概不知道吧。
這個世界是由被稱為
調停者奧丁的偉大存在所支配。

17327.en:
<center>All things art by Odin the Mediator:
their form, theirn existence, determined by him.
17327.ja:
<center>万物は　調停者オーディンにより
その形　その在り方を　さだめられ
存在を　許されているのだ。
17327.ko:
<center>모든 것은 조정자 오딘에 의해
그 형태와 방식이 정해지고
존재를 인정받도록 되어 있다.
17327.zh-Hans:
<center>万物只有在调停者奥丁
定义了它的形态、法则之后
才能存在于世间。
17327.zh-Hant:
<center>萬物只有在調停者奧丁
定義了其形態、法則之後
才能存在於世間。

17328.en:
<center>Always at Odin's side was our master—who hath the power
to keep the balance of this world—the Valkyrie of Fate.
17328.ja:
<center>その　オーディンの　かたわらには
我らの主であり　世界の均衡を保つチカラを持つ
天命の戦乙女の姿が　常に　あった。
17328.ko:
<center>그런 오딘의 곁은
우리의 주군이자 세계의 균형을 유지하는
힘을 가진 천명의 여전사가 늘 지키고 있었지.
17328.zh-Hans:
<center>我等的主人，
拥有维持世界均衡之力的天命之女武神，
也时常伴随在奥丁身边。
17328.zh-Hant:
<center>我等的主人，
擁有維持世界均衡之力的天命之女武神，
也時常伴隨在奧丁身邊。

17329.en:
<center>Howbeit... Odin the Mediator suddenly took the Valkyrie of Fate
away himself and the balance of the world began to shift.
17329.ja:
<center>しかし……　調停者オーディンは
突如　天命の戦乙女を　いずこかへ連れ去り
自ら　世界の均衡を　崩し始めた。
17329.ko:
<center>하지만…… 조정자 오딘은
천명의 여전사를 갑자기 어디론가 끌고 갔고
스스로 세계의 균형을 무너뜨리기 시작했어.
17329.zh-Hans:
<center>可是……调停者奥丁
突然将天命之女武神调往别处，
开始亲手破坏世界的均衡。
17329.zh-Hant:
<center>可是……調停者奧丁
突然將天命之女武神帶往別處，
開始親手破壞世界的均衡。

17330.en: <center>Odin doth... This world in darkness bury.
17330.ja:
<center>オーディンは……
この世界を　闇に葬ろうとしているのだ。
17330.ko:
<center>오딘은……
이 세계를 어둠 속에 묻어 버릴 속셈이야.
17330.zh-Hans:
<center>奥丁……
想要把这个世界埋葬在黑暗中……
17330.zh-Hant:
<center>奧丁……
打算把這個世界葬送於黑暗之中。

17331.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>...We are the Warriors of Valhalla! Verily, we will
take back our master, the Valkyrie of Fate, and restore
balance to the world!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17331.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「……我々は　ヴァルハラの戦士だ！
　必ずや　我らが主　天命の戦乙女を奪還し
　世界の均衡を　取り戻す！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17331.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: ……우린 발할라의 전사다!
　기필코 우리의 주군인 천명의 여전사를 되찾고
　세계의 균형을 되돌려 놔야 해!<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17331.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……我等乃是瓦尔哈拉的战士！
一定要夺回我主天命之女武神，
恢复世界的均衡！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17331.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……我等乃是瓦爾哈拉的戰士！
一定要奪回我主天命之女武神，
恢復世界的均衡！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17333.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>To find the whereabouts of the Valkyrie of Fate, the
power of those called the '3 Thulir', we must borrow.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17333.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「天命の戦乙女の　行方を探すためには
　三賢人と呼ばれる方々の　おチカラを
　借りねばなりません。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17333.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 천명의 여전사의 행방을 찾으려면
　삼현인이라 불리는 분들의 힘을
　빌려야만 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17333.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>想要寻找天命之女武神的下落，
一定要得到人称
三贤人的伟人们的帮助。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17333.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>想要尋找天命之女武神的下落，
一定要得到人稱
三賢人的偉人們幫助。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17334.en:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>The Three Thulir's fruits of wisdom... From it, they
shall have sufficient power to balance the world, but
their whereabouts we cannot grasp...<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17334.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>「三賢人とは　英知の結晶……。世界の均衡を
　より堅牢なものとする　チカラを持つ方々ですが
　その居場所は　つかめておりません……。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17334.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>: 삼현인은 지혜의 결정체……. 세계의 균형을
　더욱 견고하게 만드는 힘을 가진 분들인데
　어디 계신지는 아직 파악하지 못했습니다…….<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17334.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>三贤人乃是睿智的结晶……
拥有让世界的均衡更加强固的力量。
但现在还不知道他们所在何方。<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17334.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00233 _normal m00001>三賢人乃是睿智的結晶……
擁有讓世界的均衡更加強固的力量。
但現在還不知道他們所在何方……<stop_lip_animation n00233 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17336.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>Daring Giant, <pc>! In this Hall of Valhalla,
since ancient times, a legend hath been passed down.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17336.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「勇猛なる巨人族　<pc>よ！
　このヴァルハラの館には　古来より
　ある言い伝えが　語り継がれている。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17336.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 용맹한 거인족 <pc>!
　이 발할라의 전당에는 예로부터
　전해 내려오는 이야기가 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17336.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>勇猛的巨人<pc>啊！
在这瓦尔哈拉之馆，
自古以来流传着一句话。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17336.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>勇猛的巨人族<pc>啊！
在這瓦爾哈拉公館，
自古以來流傳著一句話。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17337.en:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>When the balance of the world is about to be shaken,
a chosen Giant Warrior will become our beacon to
save the world from darkness...<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17337.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>「世界の均衡が　崩れかけし時
　選ばれたる巨人族の戦士が　我らの道標となり
　世界を　闇から救うだろう……と。<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17337.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>: 세계의 균형이 무너지려 할 때
　선택받은 거인족 전사가 우리의 길잡이가 되어
　세계를 어둠에서 구하리라…….<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17337.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>在世界的均衡开始崩溃时，
会有一位巨人族的战士成为指引我们的路标，
将世界从黑暗中拯救出来……<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>
17337.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>在世界的均衡開始瓦解時，
被選上的巨人族戰士會成為指引我們的路標，
將世界從黑暗中拯救出來……<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17338.en:
